Texts.Chs: ^green;更多的...^white;：除了上面介绍的，还有很多地形供你发现，记住在探索时请确保安全。
Texts.Eng: ^green;...and several dozen more!^white; - There are quite literally dozens of other micro biomes to be discovered, loaded with useful resources for your studies. Keep alert and explore!

Texts.Chs: ^green;荒地^white;：你别期盼能在这里发现大量植物的踪迹，同时你会发现矿产则是这里最容易发现的资源，快拿起你的开采工具吧！
Texts.Eng: ^green;Badlands^white; - You won't find much in terms of plant life here, but you will find ore and minerals. There are most common in deserts.

Texts.Chs: ^green;泡荚灌木林^white;：这是在你探险过程中可以收集到泡荚的一种地形。常见于原体世界。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Blisterbush Field^white; - Well, this is one way to stock up on blister pods on the fly. Useful. Most common on Proto Worlds.

Texts.Chs: ^green;血石^white;：和地球差不多，只是多了血石这种奇怪的东西罢了。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Bloodstone Field^white; - Much like the planet type, Bloodstone Fields are downright strange.

Texts.Chs: ^green;钙质^white;：一个非常适合开采生硝石的地方，别忘了，生硝石可以产生碘和硝。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Caliche Field^white; - a great place to stock up on Iodine and Saltpeter by way of Caliche.

Texts.Chs: ^green;地狱火藤蔓园^white;：在这里你可以发现大量的地狱火藤蔓。噢，对了，还有岩浆。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Hellfire Field^white; - You'll find tons of Hellfire plants in these small regions. Oh, and lava.

Texts.Chs: ^green;辐射荒原^white;：除了附带辐射外，其他构成基本与荒地行星一样。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Irradiated Waste^white; - Essentially the same as their planet-size selves.

Texts.Chs: ^green;沥青^white;：这里气候炎热，焦油和骨头是最为常见的资源，对了，这里还有储量丰富的油。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Pitch^white; - Pitch regions are full of heat, tar and bones. The upside is that they provide abundant oil.

Texts.Chs: ^green;原始森林^white;：这里有着大量的树木。如果你缺原木，来这里吧！
Texts.Eng: ^green;Primeval Forest^white; - Ancient forests loaded with massive trees. A very useful place to stock up on wood.
^green;Wasteland^white; - A dead expanse of nothing fun or happy. Don't smile.
